Calculate View Factor

calc_view_factor.Rd

Calculate View Factor

Usage

calc_view_factor(FlameAngle, dist, site_slope, Lf, h, Wf)

Arguments

FlameAngle

Distance (metres)

dist

Distance (metres)

site_slope

Slope of site (degrees)

Lf

Flame length

h

Elevation of receiver (m)

Wf

Flame width

Value

View Factor

Examples


calc_view_factor(20,15,5,5,2,100)
#> [1] 0.04819081
